column5: I was at the show this weekend and did my annual trip to the Motor Guide booth to see if they have came up with a lock for the wireless series and got the same answer as every year, NO.  The rep did mention that there is going to be news in June about an add on to the wireless series to rival the Ipiolt.  Anyone know any details about this?
There's a hole in the quick removable plate for a padlock. It prevents unscrewing the hold down bracket.
